title: FS: SLer Roy Ellam early PC, T206 & funeral programs, etc. **SOLD**
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FS: SLer Roy Ellam early PC, T206 & funeral programs, etc. **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Kennedy
From the Ellam estate, this is a morbid, yet very interesting and unique lot.  Included in this lot you will receive not only the very early, pre-T206 Connersville postcard of Ellam, but a Nashville T206 as well as (2) funeral programs (one for Roy and one for his wife) and several local newspaper clippings detailing his horrific death.  Price on the lot is $500, but I will also consider cash/trades.  Email me, TwirlerReulbach@sbcglobal.net if interested.

<a href="http://imageevent.com/deadballeracubs/forsaleortradenew/everythingelse?p=11&n=1&m=-1&c=5&l=0&w=4&s=0&z=9" target="_new" rel="nofollow">[url]http://imageevent.com/deadballeracubs/forsaleortradenew/everythingelse?p=11&n=1&m=-1&c=5&l=0&w=4&s=0&z=9</a[/url]>
